optional_websetup_required_info.title: Important !
optional_websetup_required_info.description:
Your SENEC.Home V2/V3 System did not provide any long term statistic data (like total generated solar power).


With this integration you have the option to add an additional 'WEB.API: mein-senec.de Portal' integration entry in order to collect this data from the MySENEC.WebPortal.


However, using the WebAPI is only one option! Alternatively, this data can also be calculated using the Home Assistant 'Riemann sum integral' or 'PowerCalc' platforms. You can find more about this at https://github.com/marq24/ha-senec-v3/blob/master/STATSENSORS.md

set_peakshaving.name: Set Peak Shaving
set_peakshaving.description: Sets the Peak Shaving mode, battery limit and end time.

mode.name: Peak Shaving Mode
mode.description: Deactivated = Peak Shaving is deactivated, Manual = You can set the parameters yourself (battery limit, end time), Automatic = Peak Shaving is in automatic mode. In automatic mode, entries in the Battery Limit and End Time fields are ignored.

capacity.name: Battery Limit
capacity.description: Temporarily limits the capacity of the battery storage so that the remaining capacity can be used for possible losses due to the grid export limitation.

end_time.name: End time
end_time.description: Time of day at which the battery limit / capacity limitation should be switched off again.
